thread.title: BRIEF-Australian Securities And Investment Commission Accepts Enforceable Undertaking From Units Of CBA

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Australian Securities And Investment Commission Accepts Enforceable Undertaking From Units Of CBA

organizations.name: commonwealth financial planning & bw financial advice

text:
April 13 (Reuters) - Australian Securities And Investment Commission:
* ACCEPTED ENFORCEABLE UNDERTAKING FROM UNITS OF COMMONWEALTH BANK OF AUSTRALIA
* CBA’S UNITS FAILED TO GIVE EVIDENCE ABOUT ANNUAL REVIEWS TO 31,500 ‘ONGOING SERVICE’ CUSTOMERS FROM JULY 2007-JUNE 2015 & NOV 2010-JUNE 2015
* ENFORCEABLE UNDERTAKING REQUIRES CBA'S UNITS, COMMONWEALTH FINANCIAL PLANNING & BW FINANCIAL ADVICE, TO PAY COMMUNITY BENEFIT PAYMENT OF $3 MILLION Source text ( bit.ly/2IRYqLB ) Further company coverage:
